name: csc349-midterm-review
description: CSC 349 students coordinating study resources before the midterm

events.content: Did anyone confirm if the CSC 349 midterm is still on Tuesday night? Piazza has like three conflicting posts.
He clarified in lecture it’s Tuesday 10/24 at 7pm in 186-104. He said the Zoom link is only for overflow if you’re quarantined.
Sweet, thanks! Is there a study guide or are we just using the homework sets?
Homework sets are still the best prep, but I dropped a practice midterm and solution outline in Canvas under Files → Midterm Resources.
Also Prof said office hours are extended Monday 3-5pm if you want last-minute Q&A.
Perfect, I’ll swing by those office hours. Thanks for the heads-up!
